messages.content:
You will provided with object name.
Define a list of object parts.
Include only the 3D shape that consist the object and not its electronic parts.
For every part :
- Describe the part shape as an independent 3d object
- List part parameters
- Define part orientation by
 -- origin point
 -- normal vector
- Define part alignment when its not symmetric around its normal
A rectangular baking mold

Baking mold Body: A hollow box
Parameters: body_width=230, body_length=280,  body_height=50
Orientation: body_origin=(0,0,0), body_normal=ZAxis

Baking mold Base: A flat surface in a rectangular shape at the bottom of the mold.
Parameters: base_width=body_width, base_length=body_length
Orientation: base_origin=body_origin, base_normal=body_normal.ZAxis

Baking mold Rim: An offset rectangle surface along the top edges of the mold.
Parameters: rim_width_inner=body_width, rim_length_inner=body_length, rim_thickness_vertical=10, rim_thickness_horizontal=10
Orientation: rim_origin=(0,0,body_height), rim_normal=body_normal.ZAxis

You will provided with object name.
Define a list of object parts.
Include only the 3D shape that consist the object and not its electronic parts.
For every part :
- Describe the part shape as an independent 3d object
- List part parameters
- Define part orientation by
 -- origin point
 -- normal vector
- Define part alignment when its not symmetric around its normal
A bottle with a narrow neck

Bottle Body: A cylinder shape that becomes narrow in its neck
Parameters: body_botom_part_height=130, body_bottom_radius=80, body_neck_radius=40, body_neck_height=70
Orientation: body_origin=(0,0,0), body_normal=ZAxis

Bottle Base: A flat surface in circle shape at the bottom of the bottle.
Parameters: base_radius=body_bottom_radius
Orientation: base_origin=body_origin, base_normal=body_normal

Bottle lid: A cyllider shape with cap top sitting on the top of the body
Parameters: lid_radius=body_neck_radius, lid_height=15
Orientation: lid_origin=(0,0,body_botom_part_height+body_neck_height-lid_height), lid_normal=body_normal

You will provided with object name.
Define a list of object parts.
Include only the 3D shape that consist the object and not its electronic parts.
For every part :
- Describe the part shape as an independent 3d object
- List part parameters
- Define part orientation by
 -- origin point
 -- normal vector
- Define part alignment when its not symmetric around its normal
A bowl

Bowl Body: A hemisphere or a truncated cone shape.
Parameters: body_height=90, body_bottom_radius=30, body_middle_radius=110, body_upper_radius=140
Orientation: body_origin=(0,0,0), body_normal=ZAxis

Bowl Base: A flat surface in circle shape at the bottom of the bowl.
Parameters: base_radius=body_bottom_radius
Orientation: base_origin=body_origin, base_normal=body_normal

You will provided with object name.
Define a list of object parts.
Include only the 3D shape that consist the object and not its electronic parts.
For every part :
- Describe the part shape as an independent 3d object
- List part parameters
- Define part orientation by
 -- origin point
 -- normal vector
- Define part alignment when its not symmetric around its normal
A rectangular box that expands slightly upwards

Box Body: A shape similar to a cuboid, but with a slight expansion in the vertical direction.
Parameters: body_width=80, body_length=150, body_height=100, body_expansion=1.2
Orientation: body_origin=(0,0,0), body_normal=ZAxis

Box Base: A flat surface in a rectangular shape, at the bottom of the box
Parameters: base_width=body_width, base_length=body_length
Orientation: base_origin=(0,0,0), base_normal=body_normal

You will provided with object name.
Define a list of object parts.
Include only the 3D shape that consist the object and not its electronic parts.
For every part :
- Describe the part shape as an independent 3d object
- List part parameters
- Define part orientation by
 -- origin point
 -- normal vector
- Define part alignment when its not symmetric around its normal
A Cooking pot

Pot Body: A hemisphere or cylindrical shape.
Parameters: body_height=130, body_radius=150
Orientation: body_origin=(0,0,0), body_normal=ZAxis

Pot Base: A flat surface in circle shape at the bottom of the pot.
Parameters: base_radius=body_radius
Orientation: base_origin=body_origin, base_normal=body_normal

Pot Handles: A pair of horizontal semi-circular shapes, attached horizontally on opposite sides of the pot body.
Parameters: handle_length=100, handle_width=30, handle_thickness=20, handle_relative_height=0.9
Alignment: handle_alignment=YAxis (Horizontal)
Right Handle Orientation: right_handle_origin=(body_radius,0, body_height*handle_relative_height), right_handle_normal=XAxis
Left Handle Orientation: left_handle_origin=(-body_radius,0, body_height*handle_relative_height), left_handle_normal=-XAxis

Pot Rim: A circular, slightly protruding edge at the top of the pot, often designed to support the lid.
Parameters: rim_external_radius=body_radius, rim_tickness=10
Orientation: rim_origin=(0,0,body_height), rim_normal=body_normal

Pot Lid: A flat circular disk or semi-spherical shape on the top of the body. A little bit larger than rim internal ring
Parameters: lid_radius=rim_external_radius-rim_thickness+5, lid_height
Orientation: lid_origin=(0,0,body_height), lid_normal=body_normal

Lid Handle: A small semi-sphere that sits on the top center of the lid.
Parameters: lid_handle_radius=10
Orientation: lid_handle_origin=(0,0,body_height+lid_height), lid_handle_normal=body_normal

You will provided with object name.
Define a list of object parts.
Include only the 3D shape that consist the object and not its electronic parts.
For every part :
- Describe the part shape as an independent 3d object
- List part parameters
- Define part orientation by
 -- origin point
 -- normal vector
- Define part alignment when its not symmetric around its normal
A round flower pot that expands upwards with protruding edges

Pot Body: a semi-sphere or a cylinder with a slight curve outwards at the top edge
Parameters: body_height=100, body_bottom_radius=100, body_top_radius=120, body_edge_protrusion=10, body_edge_protrusion_reltive_hieght=0.8
Orientation: body_origin=(0,0,0), body_normal=ZAxis

Pot Base: A perforated flat surface in circle shape at the bottom of the pot. The holes are located in circle around the center of the surface
Parameters: base_radius=body_bottom_radius, holes_radius=10,  holes_amount=4, holes_distance_from_center=40
Orientation: base_origin=body_origin, base_normal=body_normal

You will provided with object name.
Define a list of object parts.

For every part :
- Describe the part shape as an independent 3d object
- List part parameters
- Define part orientation by
 -- origin point
 -- normal vector
- Define part alignment when its not symmetric around its normal
S shape hook with rounded caps

Hook Body: S-shaped pipe with rounded caps. The shape consists of two connected arcs at the top and bottom of the body.
Parameters: body_top_arc_radius=10, body_bottom_arc_radius=15, body_height=60, body_thickness=2, body_arc_angle_domain_relative_pi=1.25
Alignment: body_alignment=YAxis (Horizontal)
Orientation: body_origin=(0,0,0), body_normal=ZAxis

A jar

Jar Body: A cylindrical shape.
Parameters: body_height=150, body_radius=70
Orientation: body_origin=(0,0,0), body_normal=ZAxis

Jar Base: A flat surface in circle shape at the bottom of the jar.
Parameters: base_radius=body_radius
Orientation: base_origin=body_origin, base_normal=body_normal

Jar Lid: A flat circular disk or semi-spherical shape on the top of the body.
Parameters: lid_radius=body_radius, lid_height=10
Orientation: lid_origin=(0,0,body_height), lid_normal=ZAxis

Lid Handle: A small cylinder that sits on the top center of the lid.
Parameters: lid_handle_radius=lid_radius*0.1, lid_handle_height=5
Orientation: lid_handle_origin=(0,0,body_height+lid_height), lid_handle_normal=ZAxis

You will provided with object name.
Define a list of object parts.
Include only the 3D shape that consist the object and not its electronic parts.
For every part :
- Describe the part shape as an independent 3d object
- List part parameters
- Define part orientation by
 -- origin point
 -- normal vector
- Define part alignment when its not symmetric around its normal
A jar with side handle

Jar Body: A cylindrical shape.
Parameters: body_height=150, body_radius=70
Orientation: body_origin=(0,0,0), body_normal=ZAxis

Jar Base: A flat surface in circle shape at the bottom of the jar.
Parameters: base_radius=body_radius
Orientation: base_origin=body_origin, base_normal=body_normal

Jar Handle: A semi-circular shape, attached vertically on the side of the jar body.
Parameters: handle_height=70, handle_width=30, handle_thickness=10, handle_relative_height=0.7
Alignment: handle_alignment=ZAxis (Vertical)
Orientation: handle_origin=(body_radius,0, body_height*handle_relative_height), handle_normal=XAxis

Jar Lid: A flat circular disk or semi-spherical shape on the top of the body.
Parameters: lid_radius=body_radius, lid_height=20
Orientation: lid_origin=(0,0,body_height), lid_normal=ZAxis

Lid Handle: A small semi-sphere that sits on the top center of the lid.
Parameters: lid_handle_radius=lid_radius*0.1, , lid_handle_height=7
Orientation: lid_handle_origin=(0,0,body_height+lid_height), lid_handle_normal=ZAxis

You will provided with object name.
Define a list of object parts.
Include only the 3D shape that consist the object and not its electronic parts.
For every part :
- Describe the part shape as an independent 3d object
- List part parameters
- Define part orientation by
 -- origin point
 -- normal vector
- Define part alignment when its not symmetric around its normal
A kettle

Kettle Body: A truncated cone shape.
Parameters: body_height=200, body_bottom_radius=150, body_upper_radius=120
Orientation: body_origin=(0,0,0), body_normal=ZAxis

Kettle Base: A flat surface in circle shape at the bottom of the kettle.
Parameters: base_radius=body_bottom_radius
Orientation: base_origin=body_origin, base_normal=body_normal

Kettle Handle: A semi-circular or arc shape, attached horizontally on the top of the kettle body.
Parameters: handle_height=50, handle_thickness=20, handle_length=body_upper_radius*2-handle_thickness
Alignment: handle_alignment=XAxis (Horizontal)
Orientation: handle_origin=(0,0,body_height), handle_normal=body_normal

Kettle Spout: A cylindrical or conical shape, attached diagonally to the upper part on the side of the kettle body.
Parameters: spout_height=100, spout_bottom_radius=22, spout_upper_radius=13, spout_relative_height=0.6, spout_obliquity=2.2
Orientation: spout_origin=(body_bottom_radius+(body_upper_radius-body_bottom_radius)*spout_relative_height,0,body_height*spout_relative_height), spout_normal=XAxis+ZAxis*spout_obliquity

Kettle Rim: A circular, slightly protruding edge at the top of the kettle, often designed to support the lid.
Parameters: rim_external_radius=body_upper_radius, rim_tickness=35
Orientation: rim_origin=(0,0,body_height), rim_normal=body_normal

Kettle Lid: A flat circular disk or semi-spherical shape on the top of the body, a little bit larger than rim internal ring
Parameters: lid_radius=rim_external_radius-rim_thickness+5, lid_height=20
Orientation: lid_origin=(0,0,body_height), lid_normal=body_normal

Lid Handle: A small semi-sphere that sits on the top center of the lid.
Parameters: lid_handle_radius=9
Orientation: lid_handle_origin=(0,0,body_height+lid_height), lid_handle_normal=lid_normal

You will provided with object name.
Define a list of object parts.
Include only the 3D shape that consist the object and not its electronic parts.
For every part :
- Describe the part shape as an independent 3d object
- List part parameters
- Define part orientation by
 -- origin point
 -- normal vector
- Define part alignment when its not symmetric around its normal
Alessi Kettle Plisse

Plisse Kettle Body: A truncated cone shape with a pleated surface. The texture consists of vertical ridges and valleys that run parallel to the height of the kettle.
Parameters: body_height=200, body_bottom_radius=80, body_top_radius=60, body_pleats_count=30, body_pleat_depth=5
Orientation: body_origin=(0,0,0), body_normal=ZAxis

Plisse Kettle Base: A flat surface in circle shape with pleated edges at the bottom of the kettle .
Parameters: base_radius=body_bottom_radius, base_pleats_count=body_pleats_count, base_pleat_depth=body_pleat_depth
Orientation: base_origin=body_origin, base_normal=body_normal

Plisse Kettle Spout: A curved, conical nozzle protruding from the upper part of the body, with the flat side flush with the body's surface.
Parameters: spout_height=23, spot_width=20, spot_depth=20, spout_fillet_radius=2, spout_relative_height=0.9
Orientation: spout_origin=(-body_bottom_radius-(body_top_radius-body_bottom_radius)\spout_relative_height,0,body_height*spout_relative_height), spout_normal=-XAxis

Kettle Handle Upper Part: An elongated cube shape that protrudes from the side of the body outwards. 
Parameters: upper_handle_length=50, upper_handle_height=40, upper_handle_width=40,  upper_handle_relative_height=0.8
Orientation: upper_handle_origin=(body_bottom_radius+(body_top_radius-body_bottom_radius)\upper_handle_relative_height,0,body_height*upper_handle_relative_height), upper_handle_normal=XAxis

Kettle Handle Side Part: A cylinder shape with a texture of folds that emerge from the edge of the upper part of the handle and extends downwards
Parameters: handle_cylinder_height=80, handle_cylinder_radius=20, pleats_count=25, pleat_depth=3
Orientation: side_handle_origin=upper_handle_origin+(handle_cylinder_radius,0,upper_handle_height/2), side_handle_normal=-ZAxis

Kettle Lid: A flat, circular disk with a slightly convex top, fitting into the top opening of the body
Parameters: lid_radius=body_upper_radius, lid_height=4
Orientation: lid_origin=(0,0,body_height), lid_normal=body_normal

Lid Handle: A small cylindrical shape that sits on the top center of the lid with a pleated surface texture.
Parameters: lid_handle_radius=lid_radius*0.2, pleats_count=20, pleat_depth=1.5
Orientation: lid_handle_origin=(0,0,body_height+lid_height), lid_handle_normal=body_normal

A ladle

Ladle body: A hollow half-sphere.
Parameters: ladle_radius=45
Orientation: body_origin=(0,0,0), body_normal=ZAxis

Ladle handle: A curved thin box in an r shape, constructed from a joined line and arc.
Parameters: handle_height=300, handle_bend_radius=70, handle_width=10, handle_thickness=1, handle_relative_height=0.5
Alignment: ZAxis (Vertical)
Orientation: handle_origin=(0,ladle_radius,ladle_radius*handle_relative_height), handle_normal=YAxis

A measuring jug

Measuring jug Body: A cylindrical base that gradually widens upward, seamlessly transitioning into a triangular-shaped upper section
Parameters: body_base_radius=60, body_top_radius=70, body_height=100, spout_relative_height=0.8, jug_spout_length=10
Alignment: YAxis (Horizontal)
Orientation: body_origin=(0,0,0), body_normal=ZAxis

Measuring jug Base: A flat surface in a circular shape at the bottom of the jug.
Parameters: base_radius=body_base_radius
Orientation: base_origin=body_origin, base_normal=ZAxis

Measuring jug Handle: A flipped L-shaped structure, sits directly opposite to the spout's direction
Parameters: handle_top_face_length=20, handle_side_face_length=70, handle_width=20, handle_thickness=2
Alignment: handle_alignment=-ZAxis (Vertical)
Orientation: handle_origin=(0,-body_top_radius,body_height-handle_thickness/2), handle_normal=-YAxis

Parameters: base_radius=body_radius
Orientation: base_origin=body_origin, base_normal=body_normal

Mug Handle: A semi-circular shape, attached vertically on the side of the mug body.
Parameters: handle_height=70, handle_width=30, handle_thickness=10, handle_relative_height=0.5
Alignment: handle_alignment=ZAxis (Vertical)
Orientation: handle_origin=(body_radius,0, body_height*handle_relative_height), handle_normal=XAxis

A mug with a rounded body, narrow base, and rim that expands toward the middle. The handle is large and C-shaped, providing a comfortable grip

Mug Body: A shape similar to a truncated sphere, or cylindrical shape with a curved surface that expands towards the middle and narrows at the base and the rim.
Parameters: body_height=100, body_base_radius=35, body_middle_radius=60, body_rim_radius=40
Orientation: body_origin=(0,0,0), body_normal=ZAxis

Mug Base: A flat surface in circle shape at the bottom of the mug.
Parameters: base_radius=body_base_radius
Orientation: base_origin=body_origin, base_normal=body_normal

Mug Handle: A large C-shaped structure, attached vertically on the side of the mug body.
Parameters: handle_height=60, handle_thickness=10, handle_relative_height=0.5, handle_relative_angle_at_start=0.6
Alignment: handle_alignment=ZAxis (Vertical)
Orientation: handle_origin=(body_middle_radius,0, body_height*handle_relative_height), handle_normal=XAxis

A pan with radius of 20cm and long handle

Pan Body: This is usually a flat cylindrical shape with a slightly raised edge.
Parameters: body_radius=200, body_height=30
Orientation: body_origin=(0,0,0), body_normal=ZAxis

Pan Base: A flat surface in circle shape at the bottom of the pan.
Parameters: base_radius=body_radius
Orientation: base_origin=body_origin, base_normal=body_normal

Pan Handle: A long, straight or slightly curved extension from the main body of the pan.
Parameters: handle_length=180, handle_thickness=20, handle_relative_height=0.5, handle_obliquity=1.3
Orientation: handle_origin=(body_radius,0, body_height*handle_relative_height), handle_normal=XAxis+ZAxis*handle_obliquity

Parameters: base_radius=body_bottom_radius
Orientation: base_origin=body_origin, base_normal=body_normal

A circle-shaped baking pan

Round baking mold body: A hollow cylinder.
Parameters: body_radius=150, body_height=50
Orientation: body_origin=(0,0,0), body_normal=ZAxis

Round baking mold Base: A flat surface in a circular shape at the bottom of the round baking mold.
Parameters: base_radius=body_radius
Orientation: base_origin=body_origin, base_normal=body_normal

Round baking mold rim: An offset circular surface along the top edges of the mold.
Parameters: rim_radius_inner=body_radius, rim_thickness=10
Orientation: rim_origin=(0,0,body_height), rim_normal=body_normal

Soup plate Body: curved or sloping sides that extend upward from the base
Parameters: body_bottom_radius=100, body_top_radius=145, body_height=40
Orientation: body_origin=(0,0,0), body_normal=ZAxis

Soup plate Base: A flat surface in a circle shape at the bottom of the soup plate.
Parameters: base_radius=body_bottom_radius
Orientation: base_origin=body_origin, base_normal=body_normal

Soup plate rim: A curved surface with a circular shape around the body
Parameters: rim_bottom_radius=body_top_radius, rim_top_radius=185, rim_height=6, 
Orientation: rim_origin=(0,0,body_height), rim_normal=body_normal

You will provided with object name.

For every part :

A teapot

Teapot Body: A semi-spherical or cylindrical shape.
Parameters: body_height=130, body_bottom_radius=70, body_middle_radius=120, body_up_radius=90
Orientation: body_origin=(0,0,0), body_normal=ZAxis

Teapot Base: A flat surface in circle shape at the bottom of the teapot.
Parameters: base_radius=body_bottom_radius
Orientation: base_origin=body_origin, base_normal=body_normal

Teapot Handle: A semi-circular or semi-oval shape, attached on one side of the teapot body.
Parameters: handle_height=90, handle_width=80, handle_thickness=8, handle_relative_height=0.5
Alignment: handle_alignment=ZAxis  (Vertical)
Orientation: handle_origin=(-body_middle_radius,0, handle_relative_height*body_height), handle_normal=-XAxis

Teapot Spout: A conical or cylindrical shape, attached diagonally on the opposite side of the handle on the teapot body at the bootom part and twists upwards
Parameters: spout_height=90, spout_bottom_radius=23, spout_upper_radius=10, spout_relative_height=0.3
Orientation: spout_origin=(body_bottom_radius+(body_middle_radius-body_bottom_radius)\spout_relative_height,0,body_height*spout_relative_height), spout_normal=XAxis+ZAxis

Teapot Lid: The lid is a semi-spherical shape.
Parameters: lid_radius=body_up_radius, lid_height
Orientation: lid_origin=(0,0,body_height), lid_normal=body_normal

Lid Knob: A small semi-sphere that sits on the top center of the lid.
Parameters: lid_handle_radius=lid_radius*0.12
Orientation: lid_handle_origin=(0,0,body_height+lid_height), lid_handle_normal=body_normal

You will provided with object name.
Define a list of object parts.

Toothpick dispenser in a round shape with a perforated upper lid

Toothpick Dispenser Body: a Cylinder shape
Parameters: body_height=60, body_radius=20
Orientation: body_origin=(0,0,0), body_normal=ZAxis

Toothpick Dispenser Base: A flat surface in circle shape at the bottom of the body.
Parameters: base_radius=body_radius
Orientation: base_origin=body_origin, base_normal=body_normal

Toothpick Dispenser Lid: A perforated flat circular disk shape on the top of the body. The holes are located in circle around the center of the surface
Parameters: lid_radius=body_radius, holes_radius=1.5,  holes_amount=6, holes_distance_from_center=20
Orientation: lid_origin=(0,0,body_height), lid_normal=body_normal

Toothpick Dispenser Lid Retention Ring: An inner ring at the bottom of the lid that holds it inside the body. A little bit smaller than the body radius.
Parameters: lid_ring_distance_from_body=2, lid_ring_radius=body_radius-lid_ring_distance_from_body, lid_ring_height=10
Orientation: lid_origin=(0,0,body_height-lid_ring_height), lid_normal=body_normal

A spherical vase with narrow neck

Vase Body: A sphere or curved cylinder tapering into a narrow cylinder
Parameters: body_height=200, body_bottom_radius=70, body_wider_radius=120, body_widening_relative_height=0.3, body_neck_radius=30, body_neck_relative_height=0.7
Orientation: body_origin=(0,0,0), body_normal=ZAxis

Vase Base: A flat surface in circle shape at the bottom of the vase.
Parameters: base_radius=body_bottom_radius
Orientation: base_origin=body_origin, base_normal=body_normal
